articles.description: Indian-American presidential candidate Nikki Haley has sharpened her attacks on Republican rival Donald Trump in an attempt to help her campaign gain momentum before the US elections.

articles.author: Matthew Sedacca
articles.title: American airbase in Iraq targeted by 15 rockets in attack, US personnel injured: reports - New York Post
articles.description: At least a dozen projectiles were fired at an airbase Saturday that has hosted US and other international military troops in Iraq.
articles.content:
US personnel suffered minor injuries during an attack Saturday on the Ain Al-Asad airbase base in western Iraq amid escalating conflicts in the Middle East, according to reports.

articles.author: Corrie Pelc
articles.title: Colon cancer deaths are on the rise while overall cancer deaths drop - Medical News Today
articles.description: Colorectal or colon cancer deaths are increasing, especially in younger Americans, even when overall cancer deaths are falling, according to new data from the American Cancer Society.
articles.content:
• New data from the American Cancer Society shows that colorectal cancer deaths have continued to increase.
  • Meanwhile, overall cancer deaths have decreased in the United States.
